firstProject.title: My Projects
firstProject.description: Such a website could be a unique tool that can make the cooking experience of its users special and interesting. Using recipe data and cooking principles loaded onto the site through machine learning technology, when users input their available ingredients, the system uses AI algorithms to suggest personalized and unique recipes
